scripts.reinstall: rm -rf .env && rm -rf node_modules && python -m venv .env && .env/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .env/bin/pip install -e git+https://github.com/OctoPrint/OctoPrint.git#egg=octoprint[develop,plugins] && .env/bin/pip install -e .[develop] && npm install
scripts.serve: npm run octoprint:start && cd $npm_package_config_src && browser-sync start --port 8000 --proxy localhost:5000 --reload-debounce 500 --files 'static/dist/**' 'templates/**' 'translations/**/*.mo'
scripts.kill: npm run octoprint:stop && lsof -n -i:8000 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -SIGTERM
